attributes.action: make sauerkraut available on the NHS
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Sauerkraut, with it's high cabbage, and therefore iron, content, is an invaluable treatment and preventative product for anaemia, and as such would be a tremendous advantage to many users of the NHS, as well as a far cheaper alternative to traditional treatments.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
